subject_terms_3: Photography Movie directors Tan, Royston Short films
physical_appearance: "The image shows two items, namely a poster on the right and a much smaller image of a CD cover on the left hand side. ""Royston's Shorts"" is stated near the bottom of the poster. The logo of the ""Asian Film Archive"" is displayed at the bottom left hand side of the poster. The poster depicts an elderly lady sitting on a curb and holding a clothes hanger with a pair of male shorts on it. Behind her are two laundromats and a stack of clothes in a basket on top on of them."
sgcool_label_text:
The poster marked the event – release of the DVD compilation of Royston Tan’s 13 short films.
 
The poster uses a combination of photographs and simple typography.  The photographs were shot at an old Laundromat in Potong Pasir whereby passer bys were asked to pose.

Royston Tan, (b 1976) is a well known Singaporean film maker.  Among his reputed films are 12 Lotus (2008), 881 (2007) 4.30 (2005) 15, The Movie (2003), and 15 (2002).  He is the recipient of numerous national and international awards
title_text: Poster and cd cover for Shorts, a Royston Tan film compilation
subject_terms_2: Posters Containers Short films Anthology films Plays on words Motion pictures, Singaporean
